name: European Captive Insurance and Reinsurance Owners Association
goal: The protection and development of the interest of our members (owners of captive insurance companies) including representation of members in discussions with official and regulatory bodies.  Our goal is the protection and development of the european captive industry.
interests: Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Solvency II, ATA, IDD, International Insurance Programmes, OECD-Beps papers, permanent EIOPA contact
